channel.title: Can "XFCE" become non-capitalized to "Xfce" since that's how it's written :)
channel.description:
Sorry, perfectionist. Whonix can always do with more polish!
The VM names have "XFCE" in it. "Xfce" appears to not be capitalized. Perhaps only the logo, but not anywhere else on xfce.org home page.
